Can't recommend them highly enough . You see the real Africa with them rather than the package tour companies

placeInfo.name: Lams Tours - Day Tours
placeInfo.address: BB Kraft market Kotu Beach, Kotu 4209 Gambia

title: Mini Adventure!
text: If you want to do something extraordinary in just one day, I recommend the day trip to Guinea Bissau, driving through 3 countries, crossing borders 4 times and immigration 8 times. About 20 mins into Senegal the roads are very hard, you are driving most of the day and maybe you don't have breakfast until midday and lunch by 4pm, but to see as much as you do, in such a short time, it is the only way. Each stop introduces you to a local area and in Guinea Bissau you are entertained by a wonderful group of ladies - you can even join the traditional dancing if you like. Lams and for us Bax, take very good care of you, answer every question you have and without Lams' experience/ connections, I cannot imagine how you would achieve so much in one day. We went as father (50) and daughter (15) and have a memory to share forever. If you do not have time for a longer trip, then really, take this mini adventure, you will not regret it!

placeInfo.name: Lams Tours - Day Tours
placeInfo.address: BB Kraft market Kotu Beach, Kotu 4209 Gambia

title: Excellent bespoke guided trip to Guinea-Bissau
text: Super interesting trip! I contacted Lams at very short notice just a couple of days prior to my arrival in Gambia to ask him to arrange a one-day trip through Casamance (Senegal) to Guinea-Bissau. He responded right away and we agreed terms. As I was going solo the price was a bit higher than advertised, but we negotiated and reached agreement. Everything we agreed Lams delivered. I was picked up from and returned to my hotel on time. The trip was excellent. Lams and his colleague Bax were extremely friendly and informative. I was especially interested in nature plus history and current affairs and I learned so much.  Lams arranged all border crossings, visas, etc with great efficiency as he knows everyone. Zero stress. I was also fed and watered really well along the way. Lams served a huge delicious baguette with lovely potato and onion filling for breakfast. We also had a wonderful local tea with cinnamon flavour. The lunch was even better. We had an insanely delicious Fish Yassu at a small local restaurant. In summary, I had a great day with Lams and Bax and I can only highly recommend Lamstours for any travel and safari needs you have,  not just in Gambia, but in the whole region. PS. Lams and Bax have both spent considerable time and worked in Europe so if you are a tourist you will also be able to speak about many issues relating to your home countries.

placeInfo.name: Lams Tours - Day Tours
placeInfo.address: BB Kraft market Kotu Beach, Kotu 4209 Gambia

title: Lams Tours - The Best!
text:
I am an experienced traveller and The Gambia was country no. 78 I have visited.
I stumbled across Lams Tours whilst researching my trip and I must say Lams was a pleasure to deal with from the moment I emailed him to ending my trip. From start to finish, nothing was too much trouble, the whole process was seamless whilst planning what I wanted to do and communication throughout was easy and fast. 
I took 2 trips with Lams. The first was a day trip to Guinea-Bissau. Bacary came along too as navigator and guide whilst Lams drove. Through the southern part of The Gambia and then into Senegal, the drive was as entertaining as the destination. Beautiful countryside, mangrove swamps, fishermen, children heading to school and bustling towns all added to the fun. Bacary or Lams were at my side at all border crossings which made the whole process very smooth. On arriving in Guinea-Bissau, we were then taken on motorbikes to Sao Domingos and the local villages which was a fantastic way of seeing everything. The second was a day trip to the Fathala Wildlife Reserve. This involved sailing across the River Gambia by ferry to Barra in the northern part of The Gambia and then crossing the border into Senegal. Bacary (a different one this time) was with me all the way and Paul drove us in his jeep to the Reserve. Both were great guys and everything went perfectly. Upon reaching the Reserve, I went walking with the lions which was mindblowing and then took a safari to see zebras, giraffes, giant antelopes, monkeys and Kevin the rhino at close quarters. Both fantastic trips. 
Everyone connected with Lams were not only excellent and knowledgable but lovely people who I really enjoyed spending time with. I also took a return airport transfer which Lams organised and Smiley was a great lad too - friendly, safe, punctual and welcoming.
Lams was honest and transparent with pricing from day one. I sent a deposit to him beforehand to secure the trips and I could always reach him whenever I needed him. A really good guy - I would not hesitate to recommend him and his team.
Simon, UK

placeInfo.name: Lams Tours - Day Tours
placeInfo.address: BB Kraft market Kotu Beach, Kotu 4209 Gambia

title: Mixed Experience with Lams Tours
text:
First, the good. Communication while I was planning the trip was very good. Lams was willing to work with me on price, was very flexible with the deposit, and was able to provide good insight on the places that I wanted to visit. He had great connections at the checkpoints. He met us to start the trip at the place and time that we had agreed on, and gave us some really helpful tips for the border crossing into Gambia. I was looking forward to traveling with him based on the good reviews. 

Overall, the trip itself was very mixed. The first day was a trip to the Wassu circles. The drive was supposed to take under four hours but it took almost six due to a few stops on the way that I hadn't requested. I had to tell Lams that we needed to keep moving as he didn't seem aware of the time at all. As a result, the visit to the circles was very rushed. The cost was definitely not worth such a short time at the circles.

The second day was a trip to Roots James Island, which went very well. Getting to the island from Banjul requires a few steps and the guide that Lams sent was very helpful every step of the way. He made the logistics very easy and did a great job.

The third day was a city tour of Banjul. In retrospect, there isn't a lot to see so I'm not sure that I would recommend paying any guide for a city tour. The guide that Lams sent showed up an hour late and hadn't made an effort to communicate, so I assumed that he wasn't going to show up. I called Lams to get an update but he was with a group in Guinea Bissau and didn't have phone service. The guide finally showed up but I had already made different plans. 

I understand that miscommunications happen, but the real issue with this is that it was impossible to contact anyone for assistance. It's likely that you will be completely stranded if something happens, including any emergencies, while Lams is out of phone service range. Lams did refund my money for the city tour, but it would have been so much easier if he had been reachable and able to work out a solution.

placeInfo.name: Lams Tours - Day Tours

title: Top ervaring!

Onderweg wat stops bij de locale bevolking en wat wij maar wenste. Ook de gezelligheid en het lachen onderweg zullen wij niet snel vergeten. We noemen hem ook wel ‘Crazy Lams’

title: Reliable and competent tour organizer
text: I made contact with Lams Tours through Google prior to my trip to The Gambia. Lamin was prompt at replying to emails, provided me with reasonably-priced quotes for tours, arrived to pick me up on time, and was friendly and pleasant throughout our trip. Unfortunately I wasn't able to take one of Lamin's longer tours this time, but he manages tours across the area (Guinea Bissau, Senegal, Sierra Leone, ...) for all types of tourists. He listens to what you want to see and will make all the appropriate arrangements. Highly recommended!

placeInfo.name: Lams Tours - Day Tours

title: Kafountine
text: Great trip to south Senegal fishing town of Kafountine, watching the catch being brought in, tour of the huge fish-smokehouses, local market visit, and bird watching river trip to see egrets, herons, pelicans, and fish eagles, with a visit to a small community on a sacred river island to visit the Tree of Life. Lams is well known in these parts so is able to make trips special, and bring us to meet kind and generous people; the islanders even shared their "fire water" with us!

text: Tagestour nach Guinea-Bissau mit Lams Tours. Lams selbst fährt die Strecke, was ein riesen Vorteil ist, da er die Abläufe an den Grenzen besten kennt. Problemlose Grenzübertritte, alles gut organisiert und sicher. Nicht unbedingt großartige Sehenswürdigkeiten, die Reise ist eine Erfahrung des typischen Afrika.

title: Just Go!
text: I went with Lams Tours to Guinea-Bissau. I used 3 different tour companies while in the Gambia and I will say, his vehicle was the nicest one. He is also very nice and easy going. The process of going through multiple borders was pretty easy. While in Guinea-Bissau, we watched some women do a musical performance. We also went to the market.  I do wish I would have spent more time in Guinea-Bissau. He does have multi-day tours there.

title: Great trip to south Senegal and Guinea Bissau with Lams
text:
We had a wonderful trip to south Senegal and Guinea Bissau with Lams. We experienced the local lives  of such joyful and welcoming families in Guinea Bissau and south Senegal, as well as the beautiful landscape, the wildlife, the fishing, the local markets, the food, local palm wine, and so much more. A very memorable
Day. Lams is a lovely person, full of knowledge, so helpful and easy to spend time with. He had a personal engagement that evening but didn’t rush the day. The border crossings were really easy thanks to Lams’ understanding of what we needed to do. He was so helpful in getting us across the borders. Would highly recommend Lams and Alan’s tours. He also does a trip to Sierra Leone and Liberia- it’s definitely on our list when we return.

placeInfo.name: Lams Tours - Day Tours
placeInfo.address: BB Kraft market Kotu Beach, Kotu 4209 Gambia

title: Good way of experiencing the Gambia
text:
It was my first time in gambia and i had a wonderfull time. Together with friends, we booked the round trip. If you want a snapshot of the different aspects of this country, this is the trip for you! Although we saw lots of things, i never feel in a hurry. The guide was taken good care of us. Highlights of the trip for me were the overcrowded serrekunda market and visiting someones home! 

We also did the sunset cruise. During the afternoon we went onto a boat and explored the mangroves. We saw multiple beautifull birds. If you want you can try to catch a fish, which will be part of your dinner later on. Dinner itself was prepared by a local chef and was plenty and tasty. One remark: boat looked a bit filthy but we are in Afrika.
In summary, great experience!

title: Two relaxing tours / roundtrip and lazy sunset tour.
text:
We visited Gambia for the first time on invitation of a couple of friends. They advised us Janeya tours. We started with a roundtrip - a perfect day to get a quick acquaintance with The Gambia. The tour starts with a visit to the museum of the crocodile farm. It took (too?) long, but that was because we had too much to ask and our guide - Lamin Kinteh himself - was very knowledgeable. Unfortunately we could not visit a school - usually part of the tour - because all schools were closed that day. (The next day we had a 2nd chance to visit a school). After this we visited a wood carving factory and a batik market, and the Serrekunda market. Without the guides – besides Lamin also Fatou joined us -  this market would be a challenge to visit. After a lunch at the paradise beach we had some time to relax on the beach. Finally we visited the Tanji fish market – an experience in itself. 
The second trip was the (half day) "Lazy River Sunset Cruise” - a perfect way to conclude your holiday with. If you expect a crowded, luxury western-style cruise ship - than don't take this one, However: take this one If you want a intimate, relaxing trip. You will not be disappointed. We had a good guide who recognized all birds and a perfect cook - unbelievable what she had cooked in her small kitchen on board.
We are looking forward to our next visit to The Gambia and part of this visit will certainly be a 2- or 3-day tour with Janeya tours

title: Roundtrip en Sunsetcruise
text: Afgelopen week zijn we opnieuw in Gambia geweest, nu met vrienden. Omdat zij nog niet eerder in Gambia geweest waren hebben we eerst de roundtrip geboekt, zodat ze een indruk kregen. De roundtrip was fantastisch georganiseerd. We waren met z'n vieren in de open landrover, en mochten aangeven als we wilden stoppen of ergens wat langer wilden kijken. In het museum viel vooral de uitgebreide kennis van onze gids (tevens eigenaar van Janeya Tours) op. Terwijl andere groepen met andere gidsen in een kwartiertje door het hele museum liepen, kregen wij veel achtergrondinformatie. Ook de andere onderdelen van de roundtrip waren zeker de moeite waard. Een half uur lopen op de Serrekundamarket maakt heel veel indruk. De tocht langs kleine dorpjes ook, en daarna lekker ontspannen op Paradise Beach. Vervolgens ook nog de vismarkt in Tanji, een heel complete dag. Prettig was ook dat er meer dan voldoende drinken was. Speciaal voor onze vrienden hebben we later in de week de sunsetcruise gedaan. Echt een aanrader: een lekker ontspannen boottrip door de mangrovebossen, veel vogels gezien, en een heerlijk buffet op de boot klaargemaakt. Ook hier weer meer dan genoeg drinken, alles was goed verzorgd.

title: Gambian tours
text: been on holiday many times to The Gambia and have used Janet's tour each and every time and he just gets better fully safe with insurance helpful and always happy to arrange the tours to suit the persons needs Also very reasonable Best tour rep in Gambia

title: Worst trip ever!
text:
We were picked up promptly and transport to the "boat", although they advertise wooden and comfortable boat, I cannot believe that they call this a boat.  Unfortunately we were the only 2 people on the trip which was a bit disconcerting.  The boat was nailed together and looked extremely unsafe, it was also dirty and uncomfortable. I would have difficulty calling it a boat it was so ramshackle and dilapidated. The staff has put two plastic chairs on the top deck for us to sit on, and the cushions were filthy.  There were " sun mats" available, which were ripped and torn, and again filthy so we chose not to use these.  The lazy day river trip followed the Gambia river through the mangroves and although interesting enough, after 2 hours you kind of get bored of it.  There is very little to view, one monkey and birds!  We stopped for lunch which was delicious but as there were six staff standing around watching us eat a bit uncomfortable, especially as no one spoke to us.  We retreated back to the top deck whilst the staff ate, which seemed to really be made for them as the ate loads.  The so called captain then spent several hours fishing whilst we sat around doing nothing.  The tour guide popped up about once an hour to ask us if we wanted a drink and made small talk, but I think it was difficult for him as we were the only two passengers he ran out of things to say.  Apart from him none of the other staff uttered a word to us, so we felt like we were intruders on there somewhat.
Toilets!  OMG they were so disgusting you just couldn't use them, no toilet seat, no toilet paper, nothing to wash your hands with and very very dirty.  The cloth to dry your hands on was probably an oil rag in it's previous life.
The return journey was exactly the same as coming, 21/2 hours of looking at mangroves.  I know it was billed as a lazy day but this was pushing it.  Despite having not spoke to us all day the inevitable tip box was brought out as we landed and we did tip but I am not quite sure for what.  As most things in the Gambia, they want your money mostly for very little effort.  If you want to sit for 7 hours in a plastic chair looking at nothing then this is the trip for you.  I cannot even begin to tell you how disappointed we were with this trip, we have travelled all over the world but this was a complete waste of time and money.  The cost for 2 people was £100.

title: Great Day Tours
text:
Booked two day tours and we were well looked after. Thoroughly enjoyed sight seeing and experiencing the real Gambia. The assistance was above and beyond with helping us to obtain a visitors visa to enter the neighbouring country of Senegal for a day Safari. 
Thank you to the staff and management for doing a great job and helping with the tours and also helping the community. 
Tourists - bring plenty sun screen! 
Sorry for delayed review from our December trip.

title: Great tour guides
text:
We recently used Janeya Tours to travel to George Town , the driver and guide where all that could be asked and more beside,
We would have no hesitation in recommending them to any one.

title: Geweldige ervaring
text:
Via mede reizigers zijn we bij Janeya Tours uitgekomen en onze ervaring met hen is onvergetelijk. De Round Trip en het bezoek bij de Lamin Lodge waren mede door Lamin Kinteh geweldig, zijn kennis is uitstekend en omgang met zijn "klanten" is perfect. Als je een tour wil gaan doen in Gambia (vanuit Kololi), wat eigenlijk een must is, ga hier absoluut langs. Een leuke bijkomst is dat hij ook nog eens Nederlands spreekt, hierdoor voelt het ook gelijk een stuk persoonlijker.
Groetjes, Kirsten en Mike

title: Aanrader
text: zochten een excursie bureau om ons 2 een daagse trip naar JanjangBureh te verzorgen. Vele bureau's aangesproken, niemand kon ons overtuigen, tot we bij Janeya tours aankwamen. De eigenaar Kunta Kinteh, spreekt Nederlands, is absoluut niet opdringerig (wat een verademing in Kololi), en maakt waar wat hij beloofd. De gids Dembo en de chauffeur mbenga (vergeef me als naam niet 100 juist is), hebben ons 2 fantastische dagen bezorgd. Hebben deze tocht volledig privé gedaan, met als hoogtepunten: slapen in een hutje, maar vooral een boottocht om de Nijlpaarden te zoeken, met kok aan boord om ons ontbijt klaar te maken. Ik kan er uren van vertellen, maar indien nood aan info, laat dan weten. Zowel excursie, maar zeker ook Janeya tours 10 op 10. Gr Bianca en Kurt

title: Heerlijk ontspannen tijdens de Lazy River Sunset Cruise
text: Deze keer een heerlijke trip gemaakt met een boot op de rivier. We voeren tussen de mangrove bossen door, werden door onze gids en tevens eigenaar van Janeya, Lamin Kinteh, gewezen op diverse bijzondere vogels (pelikanen !)  en andere bijzonderheden, zoals vrouwen die oesters verzamelden. Op de boot konden we benden in de schaduw zitten, maar boven op het dek waren ook luie stoelen beschikbaar om in te zonnen. Al varende werd op de boot  een heerlijk buffet voor ons klaargemaakt. Wij vonden het erg leuk dat dit een prive-trip was, alleen ons gezelschap van 4 personen en de gids. Genoten van het heerlijke eten, en meer dan voldoende te drinken,  terwijl langzaam de zon onderging. In het donker weer terug. Een fantastische trip, en fantastisch georganiseerd

title: Fantastische ervaring met Janeya tours
text: Eind maart/begin april 2014 hebben wij onze huwelijksreis naar The Gambia gehad, en daarbij hebben wij onze trips geboekt bij Janeya tours. Wij kunnen alleen maar zeggen dat het een geweldige ervaring was. Omdat wij 2 tours boekten, kregen wij 1 gratis tour van een halve dag. Onze gids Dodou is ontzettend begaan met zijn gasten en legde ons volledig in de watten. Wij kunnen zeggen dat we er een nieuwe vriend bij hebben. Wij hebben de tours Jeep Adventure en Roots gedaan. Als gratis tour zijn we naar Lamin Lodge geweest. Bij alle tours kwamen we niets te kort. Zeer aan te raden!

title: Excellant
text:
We was within Chillis bar in the strip and was given advice to use this company. Dodou came to the restaurant and explained what the company had to offer and the pricing. At that time they were offering buy 2 trips and get one free, unfortunately only there for one week so could not except this offer. JANEYA TOURs are fully insured.
There was only me and my husband in the tour, which was great. All the drinks were provided free within the price, yet did a tour through Thomas Cook and had to buy our drinks.
Our guide for the two days was DODOU, and God Bless Him has was great, and attentive to our every need and carried all my shopping bags. He even went out of his way and guided us at the local craft market.
This company I would recommend to any person. They are located as walking up the strip from the Senegambia Hotel, on the left hand side, next to Safeway Market, dressed in orange.

title: Best Guides...:)
text: In the end of January 2014 I have visited Gambia with a group of 14 people for one week. Janeya Tours organised 4 day trip around Gambia for us. I could say it was just perfect. Guides were extremely helpful and professional. The owner of a company - Lamin, was travelling with us all the time even though he was ill. I definitely recommend Janeya Tours if need a tour organiser in Gambia. Thanks a lot guys...:)

title: 1/2 day Banjul, full day "Lazy Day" and trip to Senegal
text: We visited 4 tour companies in Senegambia and chose Janeya tours as we liked the way that this company was doing things "right".  Ethically, organisationally, how the staff spoke about the company, the fact that it is Gambian-run - all were positive and they keep the groups small (up to 6) which others do not (up to 12 in a group - and more).  I have nothing but good things to say about the company - they were punctual, informative, and looked after us well at all stages.  A special shout-out to "Dodou" who kept us laughing and always looked after us throughout the chaos of a trip to Senegal.  Highly recommended.

title: In our opinion The Best tour company in The Gambia without a doubt !
text: My daughter and myself recently visited The Gambia and were fortunate enough to choose Janeya Tours for our trips. The company is owned by Lamin a local man who started as a tour guide himself. He is one of the most helpful and efficient person that we met in Gambia especially if you want to do the Fatalla game reserve trip to Senegal. We had the most fantastic time on all three of our tours. The first tour we did was the Round Trip, which is a great tour to start with as it gives you a wonderful insight into the Gambian way of life, its culture and fantastic people. All the trips were tailor made for us, we  had personal tours which meant we could stop and start when we wanted ( within reason ). Our driver and guide were very knowledgeable and made our trips so special. In our opinion you have to walk past the rest on the strip to get to the best. A really big thank you to Lamin and all his staff for making our holiday as wonderful as it was.

title: Goed weerzin!!!!
text:
We hebben wederom vakantie gehouden in Gambia. En ook weer fijne trips gemaakt met Janeya Tours van eigenaar Lamin Kinteh. Heel erg bedankt vrienden voor alle aandacht en uitleg. Top waa de lazy day heerlijk relaxen op de rivier en ja hoor mijn eerste vis gevangen uit mijn hele leven. 

Dankbaar voor alle fijne dagen bij Janaya Tours. We hopen jullie weer te zien xx

title: 4 by 4 - great day
text: Fantastic day trip with Janeya - started off at the fascinating bee farm - very informative, followed by reptile farm, then onto a local school to meet a few of the school children, and to top the day off a delicious lunch on Paradise beach and a walk around Tunje fishing market - thanks to Bob and Fatou for making it a day to remember.

title: Prima excursies!
text:
In de twee weken vakantie in Gambia uitstekende ervaringen opgedaan met Janeya Tours. Vooral de trip naar St. James Island was geweldig. Evenals de Lazy Day op de rivier. Er werd heerlijk voor je gekookt en je werd volledig in de watten gelegd. Als bonus voor het maken van twee trips mochten gratis een excursie uitzoeken. De keus viel op Bird Watching, behalve het vroege tijdstip, een geweldige ervaring! Kortom, wie een geheel verzorgde excursie wenst in Gambia zit er niets anders op dan bij Janeya Tours aan te kloppen.

Jolanda en Jan

title: First Class Excursion
text: We recently took a day trip with Janeya Tours.  A group of 7 of us went on the Roots Trip with Janeya who were absolutely first class in every way.  Our guides for the day were Dodou and Sam, we were looked after so well and everything went like clockwork. We had a superb day and would not hesitate in recommending Janeya Tours to anyone visiting The Gambia.  Thanks again to Dodou & Sam.

title: Thank you!
text: We made 3 trips with Janeya Tours and we are very confident! The driver and guides were very friendly and flexible. Of course you can see much more with local guides. And they took good care of us. We would especially like to thank the organization for our visas to Senegal. We can really recommend Janeya Tours!

title: Excellent Gambia birding experience by Senegambia Birding
text: Senegambia Birding organized a 2 week birding tour through Gambia for us (party of 2) in December 2024. We stayed a few days in the Belgambia Lodge of Jim and Kaddy (best cook of Gambia!) from which we did day trips to diverse birding areas in the west of Gambia (including coast). We arrived without suitcases (seems to happen a lot when you travel with Royal Air Maroc......), but Jim and Kaddy immediatly organized the essentials. The birding hide of the lodge is excellent for photography and also the mangrove area right next to it is already a heaven for birders. After the excellent hospitality of Jim and Kaddy we took off with our guide Bob (Buba) Barry and our driver Musa. Bob was an energetic, lively, and very entertaining guide, with an amazingly keen eye for spotting birds and directing us to the right position for the best light for photography. He spotted many many rare and infrequent birds based on his long standing experience and supurb feeling for the bird’s habitats. In 2 weeks we made great photos of over 200 species and saw many more. Musa was a calm, always positive, patient, and very careful driver. For us they were a great combination of guide and driver who were not only entertaining, but also very professional in terms of bird spotting, photograpy, and solving problems  when necessary (although there were very little). All in all a great Gambia birding experience due to the great professional guide Bob, the reliable driver Musa, the wonderful Senegambia organizer Jim and his wife Kaddy . We warmly recommend them if you plan a birding trip through Gambia.

title: Een aanrader!
text:
Wij (echtpaar) hebben een vogelspot-excursie gemaakt naar Mandinari, Tendaba Camp en Abca's Creek Lodge in Kassagne. De begeleiding was deskundig; we hebben ongelofelijk veel vogels gezien, en de gedreven gidsen waren geweldig (Ousman, Ibrahim/Passy, Jim). Ze weten en zien veel, kennen ook veel routes en plekken die iemand op zichzelf nooit zou ontdekken. Prima, geduldige chauffeur (Sly). Zonder uitzondering allen sympathieke mensen.
De organisatie speelde professioneel in op onze wensen.
Kortom: een aanrader!

title: Gambia Tour, Experiencing the true Gambian culture and every day life
text: Great one day tour with the best guide in Gambia, ML! ML gave me so much info on Gambia’s culture, history, traditions and every day life! He has a political science academic background and so kind and friendly!! Thanks ML for this great experience! Go with Arch Tours and ML! Strongly recommended!!

title: NEVER TO BE FORGOTTEN THE GAMIA EXPERIENCE!
text:
We arrived by cruise ship for a full day The Gambia experience and were not disappointed.  Emmel, our incredibly friendly and knowledgeable tour guide with excellent English skills wowed us virtually all day.  His personal and wide-ranging insights into the history, culture, politics and economy of The Gambia were insightful.  We learned so much.  But most of all, our visit to a family in a quiet seemingly "remote" village and the opportunity to interact with the children and speak with the other family members was an experience of a lifetime.  We sadly didn't think about bringing small presents (pens, pencils, notebooks or even the amazing pastries from the ship) -- so anyone reading this and considering this visit, please do so on our behalf.  I would be glad to reimburse you for your expenses -- we were so moved by this personal experience.

We have had many guides from many agencies in many different countries around the world and Emmel is surely in the top five

THANKSW, EMMEL!!

title: Great company!  Would highly recommend them!
text:
We went with Arch Tours to their 4 tours in 1 day and for the 2-day Georgetown trip. During our time in The Gambia, we used 3 different tour companies, and Arch Tours was our favorite, mostly due to the tour guide "M.L."  He is very friendly, explains everything very well, and tries to protect his customers from any issues.
The meals that were included with our tours were good and there were always drinks available for us.
The boat ride to see the chimpanzees was awesome and left right from our hotel.
The home we visited as part of the Georgetown tour was very cool. It is way out in the country and consists of one big family. It is definitely different than visiting a village close to the city.
We enjoyed both tours and would recommend them both. Their Georgetown tour recently changed their overnight accomodations to Kairoh Garden Kuntaur, which was definitely an improvement, but do be aware their wifi isn't great, the beds are brutally hard, and it is hot with no air conditioning.

title: Leuke dagtocht in Gambia
text:
We waren met vier personen 2 begeleiders en 1  chauffeur. Het vervoer was een landrover defenders met een openlaadbak met zitbanken 
Een drukke  markt is in het algemeen niet mijn favoriet vanwege  de drukte en de ongewenste aandacht, maar door de begeleiding werd het erg relaxed. Veel specifiek details werd gegeven  over de diverse voedingswaren. Het werd een Leuke tocht over markt.
De favoriet is de vismarkt in Tanji. De grote schaal waarop de vis met een relatief primitieve manier aan land gebracht wordt en verwerkt was indrukwekkend. Prachtig om te zien. Een aanrader!
De krokodillen pool was leuk met name de door het verhaal wat hierbij verteld is. De koeien en geiten markt was erg leuk om te zien en indrukwekkend door de hoeveelheid beesten die er te zien waren. 
De reisleiding was erg prettig in omgang  en ook informatief. Ze waren er echt voor ons en wij niet voor hen. De reis is zeker aan te bevelen voor mensen die een echt stukje Gambia willen zien.

title: 5/5 experience
text:
I can highly recommend Arch tours.

I booked this agency for airport pickup and drop off. I had accommodation at Airbnb in Serrekunda on the street without any name. I just gave phone number of the accomodation to the driver and he called to the accomodation and found out how to get there. So it was without any problems for me.

The other day I did the 4 tours in 1 day. Such an amazing trip, I feel I did more than just 4 tours in 1 day :) Very kind guides (one of them was actually the owner). There were 6 tourist, 2 guides + driver. Lot's of drinks were provided during the tour.

Then I took the Marakisa Rivercamp. I was the only one there so I had my personal guide :) Even if I don't know much about the birds, the river cruise was amazing experience, we even saw wild crocodile. If you want to see amazing nature and you prefer not so touristic place, just take this one.

The drop off to the airport was again without any problems, we made it in time even despite the heavy traffic.

In total, it's 5/5 and I'll definitely take this agency again if I visit Gambia again. Moreover this agency is local one and you will support the locals by booking them :)

title: Very happy with our tours
text:
We did 2 trips with Arch Tours after reading the reviews on Tripadvisor and we weren't disappointed.

4 tours in 1 day and the Fathala Game reserve in Senegal

Both trips were real cultural experiences - well organised, informative and run by friendly guides. 

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them for tours in Gambia

title: Amazing tour of the real Gambia
text:
We were picked up at 8 by our guide Dawda, and driver Assan, and headed off for the Crocodile Sancturary. I thought I wouldn’t be too fussed, but ended up loving it because of the history/folklore, the wildlife, amazing trees, and of course being up-close to the pre-historic wonders. Very well run, and informative. Happy to give a donation towards its upkeep. 

Serekunda market was incredible, noisy, ‘fragrant’, and at times almost overwhelming as our senses tried to take in everything that was going on around. The locals were all friendly, and fascinating to get a taste of real everyday life in The Gambia. Being able to dodge their wheelbarrow ‘shopping trolleys’ is essential and fun. 
Getting around The Gambia is a challenge, and the fact that they are building multi-lane roads only adds to the dust and delays. Lots of opportunities to be patient. 
The local cattle and livestock market was brilliant, and all aspects of animal husbandry is incorporated here, as it would have been in the UK in years gone by. 

As there were just the 2 of us on this tour, we had more flexibilty, so skipped The Lamming tea and cake, and headed for the Gambian Village, which Dawda chose carefully so visits, and gifts, and shared amongst the villages. We bought a 50kg bag of rice on the way, which is shared very fairly amongst the families, and had a wonderful time with the very playful children. A very humbling experience. 

Next stop was lunch at Paradise Beach, which lives up to its name even if the road leading to it does not. A relatively varied menu on offer, and a beautiful walk along the beach after. Very relaxing. 

Final stop was the largest fishing village in The Gambia, whose name I forget. Another hubbub of activity and life, and amazing to see the production line of all the fish coming off the boats, the porters, the little local sellers, the ice production factory for larger sellers, the smoking sheds, boat building, net fixing, and everything else needed to run such an essential aspect of life in The Gambia. 

The trip back to the hotel is as ever fairly slow due to the amount of traffic that overwhelms the roads, the check points, the markets along the way which slows everything down, but always a chance to glimpse real Gambian life at every turn. 

It was an amazing day, huge thanks to Dawda and Assan, and we would highly recommend this tour, and the company. All the best. Marcus & Tracy

title: Highly recommend Arch Tours
text: We arranged to visit Fathala reserve in Senegal through Arch tours. Communication with Mr Conteh was via email and WhatsApp and was very prompt and professional. We were sent a list of everything we would need to take so were well prepared. Due to ill health we had to postpone our initial trip very last minute but this presented no problem for them and we simply rearranged. On the day we were accompanied by Dowda who worked tirelessly to make sure our day was enjoyable. We had a cooler of drinks which kept us refreshed all day and we were provided with a sandwich for breakfast (it was a prompt 06:40 start) and lunch at a restaurant just outside the reserve. This was a long tiring day but we had a wonderful time thanks to Arch Tours experience and organisational skills and Dowda’s excellent guiding skills, good English, local contacts and sense of fun which matched ours perfectly.

title: Real cultural experience
text: After reading reviews we booked direct with Arch Tours via their website. Our tour consisted of me, my wife, Douda the tour guide and our driver. This is a really great packed day & not the type of tour you get via TUI! If you have a bad back beware as some of the roads/tracks are extremely bumpy. We thought the tour & Douda were excellent and would highly recommend. Highlights were touching a crocodile, meeting the children at a local school and the craziness of the fish market. Really informative insight into the real Gambia and it's people.

title: Zeer de moeite waard.
text: Veel impressies opgedaan. Veel verteld over bezochte punten. En achtergrondverhalen. Schoolbezoek en inkijk bij familiebezoek indrukwekkend. Zeker daar proberen te ondersteunen met bekende middelen. Al met al zeer geslaagd en vermoeiend aan einde van de dag.

title: A lot of The Gambia even in one day!
text: Mo and Bas the driver gave a lot of informations to us and answered our questions! We made the tour at the 04. Dec 2022! We visited a small village with the visite of a local house! We touched crocodiles and visited the animal market! A paradise beach with relaxing and at the end the famous fish market! All in one day, whow what an experience! Thank you for this trip!

title: Georgetown tours
text: Did the Georgetown tour with Dee and we throughly enjoyed it. He always made us feel comfortable and was very knowledgable. Would defo recommend.

title: Great tours
text: We went on two trips - the 4 in 1 (with Lamin) and the Abuko nature reserve (with David) and both were great. The 4 in 1 we got to see different parts of daily life in The Gambia and Lamin was great and very helpful. We would recommend this trip for actually getting to see some of the country. Our second trip was bird watching and to Abuko nature reserve and David was very knowledgeable and we saw lots of birds with him (including a blue breasted kingfisher and violet turaco - neither of which I had heard of before the trip). I would definitely recommend going with Arch tours - they are good value for money too especially given the tours are private. Thank you to Lamin, David and Assan

title: Out of this world experience
text: Brilliant experience from start to finish, so informative. Our hearts went out to the school and families we visited were so friendly and welcoming. Crocodile park was amazing. Our guide was absolutely fantastic.

title: Best of Gambia tour
text: We had the best day out.... It was very touching to visit the school and the compound in the village. The children were lovely and ready happy to get gifts.  The markets were an eye opener... Fantastic. Lamin Lodge and the donuts was a nice touch .. And the view from there was stunning.  I was unsure about the Crocs before I went but really loved the visit.  Paradise Beach was so good, we went on our tour with a lovely couple from Oostende and had lunch &drinks with them... Will definitely visit again and do the tour again

title: Fully recommended
text: Everything was perfectly organized and reasonably priced.  We were in Fathala Park in Senegal for a jeep safari and the price of the tour included everything, so you didn't have to worry about anything.  In addition, the guide was very knowledgeable and told many interesting stories about the Gambia.

title: 4 Tours in 1 day is een top tour!
text: Wat een fijne, aardige reisleiders! De reisleider kon veel vertellen over alle plekken waar we kwamen en kon op alle vragen antwoord geven. Als we ergens langer of korter wilde blijven was dit geen enkel probleem. We hebben ondanks een beetje regen een heerlijke dag gehad waar we onze ogen hebben uitgekeken. Toen we bij een echte Gambiaanse familie waren hadden we graag meer meegenomen om te kunnen geven. Elke keer gaan de reisleiders naar een ander gezin dus ik zou als tip meegeven om alles wat je thuis niet meer nodig hebt mee te nemen en aan de familie geven waar je op bezoek gaat. Denk aan oude kleding, schoenen, handdoeken, bedlinnen, boeken (Engels), pannen,  spelletjes (kaarten, yahtzee), ballonnen, een bal en natuurlijk doen snoepjes het ook goed. Deze tour is echt een aanrader daar je veel op een dag te zien krijgt!!

title: Real heart and soul of Gambia! 5 stars
text: This is one of the best tours I ever had! Super professional and on-time (don’t count the traffic delays in Banjul). They showed me the heart and soul of Gambia within 1- day and there were spots that was just breath taking such as the Lamin Lodge, the beach and the crocodile experience. Lamin my guide was superb and so was the driver Mr Tom. I cannot say how satisfied I am with this tour, it is really value for the money paid. There is a reason they have 5 star review here on TripAdvisor! Look no further book with them you won’t regret it.

title: Outstanding tours in The Gambia
text: We took 4 day tours with Arch Tours during our stay in The Gambia (4 in 1 tour, Fathala, Kunta Kinteh and Abuko). All tours were outstanding and made our experience incredible, not only visiting but learning a lot and having a good time. I would recommend Arch Tours to anyone visiting The Gambia. Special thanks to Lamin, Barra and Emel for taking care of us during these days!

title: Discover the real Gambia with this amazing tour
text: Great way to discover the real Gambia. Sanna and Omar were good company with an answer to all our questions. The tour is very varied with touristical venues, but also visits to Gambian families and more to discover what life in the Gambia is like. We learned so much in just one day and would highly recommend any tourist to book this tour to see as much as you can in only 1 tour. It really isn’t too much, I promise! Clint & Nathalie

title: The great safari adventure with the best guides
text:
We are a young family with a child, and we visited the Fathala Safari Park in Senegal with our guides, Malcolm and Lamin. It was an amazing experience that we will remember forever because it was so spectacular to see the wild animals in their natural environment and to be immersed in the magnificent nature surrounding them. It is a formative experience for any age. 
When vacationing in Gambia, you will be offered all the time to be taken on a tour by many people, everyone knows someone who has a tour company, or guides just offer their services on the street. And choosing randomly any of those is perhaps fine if you would like to just briefly venture outside your hotel and see something close by. But if you would like to be sure to get a quality experience, or to go on a safari, which is a much more complex trip to organize, then it is much better to choose a reliable tour company, with lots of experience and with excellent guides, such as Bushwacker Tours. 
Our guides were very attentive, and alert to all our needs, they anticipated and solved any issues quickly and competently. We were taken care of in every sense, and made to feel safe all the time. They were punctual and respectful, and they planned our meals and drinks well. Every leg of the trip worked out well, and we had a very good experience throughout the whole day. Additionally, the guides were also patient and kind with our child and all his needs and questions. If possible, make sure to have Malcolm as your guide because he is very knowledgeable, tactful, cultured, and really a joy to talk with and to learn from. Needless to say, his English is excellent. 
We recommend Bushwacker Tours to any tourists, especially those who expect smooth, reliable, professional service, and who want to enjoy their trip while feeling safe and taken care of. If you travel with children, again, this is a tour operator for you. We thank Malcolm and Lamin also in this way, and we wish them and the company success in all their future endeavors. See you next time!

title: Amazing
text: From start to finish these guys are amazing the communication was spot on and they worked around us Lamin and his team were great we did the boat trip lazy day  with fishing  and it was fabulous ... lamin pointed out loads of birds and the food was amazing he taught me to fish much to my husbands amazement and we caught some fish cant recommended these guys enough ... we will be back December to do more .....

title: Unforgettable two day trip to Janjanbureh
text: We had a great 2day trip to Janjanbureh, including great wildlife, interesting cultural sites and even a surprise spontaneous visit to a nomadic camp. Alieu and our driver Lamin were absolutely professional, extremely knowledgeable and I can recommend them 100% for a memorable trip through Gambia.

title: Excellent agency, excellent tour
text:
Took the Roots tour with Lamin at Bushwhacker Tours after visiting a number of agencies on the strip. Many companies offer similar tours  but Lamin stood out to us as a genuine and passionate person and we definitely made the right decision by going with our instinct. 

The Roots tour was most definitely a highlight of our time in the Gambia and everyone should visit Kunta Kinteh island if they can. It's not an easy tour due to the harrowing history of the island but it's such an important part of West African history and a history that should not be repeated. 

The whole tour was incredibly smooth and Lamin a wonderful tour guide who has a great sense of humour. The day flew by despite the early start to catch the ferry in Banjul (an experience in itsef), from the jeep ride through the countryside (facemasks came in very handy) and then the time at Juffureh and Kunta Kinteh island. Definitely spend a day of your holiday on this tour and make sure you pick Bushwhacker to travel with.

title: In resort and tourist area U will never have idea about country.Unforgetable experience, speccially visit poor villlage with skm
text: Through Gambia ... It was 2 days tour with all  included.Our lovely guide Lamin and drivet Baba was greag!! It was the best 2 days of my week in Gambia!! So happy to buy tour with this profeccional agency.In my research of some small agencies Bushwackers was quick, arrived to my hotel and helped choose right tour for me.Highly recomeded.!!!

title: Awesome tour with Super Professional Bushwacker Tours
text: We had a wonderful tour with Bushwacker. We are a family of 5 with 3 young kids. Alieu and his team were super professional, responsive and flexible. This was super helpful given we had 3 young kids. Alieu had to handle a few curveballs and he kept his cool and had creative solutions.  I contacted several tour companies and Alieu and his team stand out from the rest.

title: Exploring Gambia and its birds!!
text:
We got in contact with Alieu by the owner of the Footsteps. We had a great time. We spend about 5 days together and travelled also to Janjabureh.  We choosed to go by boat, a 5 hours trip. Worthile!!! 
As I liked birds. Alieu had decided to bring a driver who was also a very good bird watcher. We had a lot of fun together and at the end my husband was looking for  birds too. 😄😄😄 
Thanx to Dembo and Alieu

title: 2 day central and east Gambia tour
text: A fantastic two day tour covering that the sites that we had discussed with bushwhacker. They were extremely professional, knowledgeable, friendly and managed amazing access to makes to some experiences that would be hard to achieve with a larger group. I would definitely use them again and have some fantastic memories of this trip.

title: Fabulous experience
text:
Booked 2 tours, river Gambia and Roots tour in March.
Lamin our tour guide was both friendly and knowledge keeping us hydrated all day with cold drinks.
The River Gambia tour was so relaxing even tried fishing for the first time. Lunch was provided fresh fish and Gambian dishes it was delicious. 
The Roots tour to James Island was a fabulous experience,  we had done this tour on a previous visit to the Gambia but due to Covid the only way for us to get to Barra was on the ferry from Banjul, what an experience.
If you want to see Gambian life as it is day to day you have to do this.
Tried to convince Lamin to add it to his tour itinerary.
I would definitely recommend Bushwacker tours and Lamin as your tour guide a knowledgeable and polite young man who works really hard.
You'll find them on the Senagambia strip just down from the supermarket.

title: Amazing 3 days trip in the Gambia
text:
We went on a three day round tour from the coastal region along the River Gambia to Janjanbureh. The tour was arranged individually according to our preferences.
We got stunning impressions of nature, history, culture and people. 
Alieu Bayo is an excellent tour guide, well prepared, always a step ahead, offering options with a strong understanding of one’s preferences, always looking for the best experience. 
Last but not least many thanks to Lamin for his perfect driving.
We strictly recommend Bushwhacker Tours.

title: Eintagestour in Gambia mit unbeschreiblich vielen Eindrücken
text: Perfekt organisiert war unsere Eintagestour in Gambia mit unserem deutsch sprechenden Reiseleiter und dem routinierten Fahrer im offenen Jeep. Zu jedem Zeitpunkt fühlten wir uns sicher und hervorragend informiert. Hätten wir mehr Zeit gehabt für weitere Touren, hätten wir uns wieder für Bushwhakers entschieden! Vielen Dank für einen wunderschönen Tag mit unvergesslichen Erlebnissen sagen Lorenz, Lisi, Peter und Evi!

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much for the review and using our services. We hope to serve you again.

title: Fantastische tours, bevlogen gids!
text:
Twee prachtige tours gemaakt naar de Casamance in Senegal, en Albreda / Kuntha Kinte Island in gambia. Top gids ging mee: Lamin Ceesay.
Aanrader!

ownerResponse.text:
Thanks a lot for using our services and putting up this beautiful review. We look forward to serving you again. 
Best regards from all of us

title: Great service
text: Having used Bushwackers before, we selected a visit to the Wildlife Reserve at Fathala, Senegal.  We were collected on time from our hotel and looked after very professionally by Lamin throughout.  His depth of knowledge regarding everything we encountered was truly amazing. Would certainly recommend the company to others and we will certainly use them again.

title: Full day tour 4X4 in the Gambia
text: We booked this tour with Bushwhacker and it was excellent. They picked us up, on time, at our hotel and we followed the planned itinerary. We received a lot of explanations and interesting information all over the way. Our guide Alieu was extremely friendly and knowledgeable. He was also interacting with the people we met so that our tour made us really feel how the Gambian people lives. After the great "off-side" roads, the stop at the paradise beach was amazing. We arrive at the Tanji fishing village right on time to see all boats, the people and the view at sunset. With Bushwhackers, you are in safe and reliable hands.

title: Bester Tourguide
text:
Wir haben gleich vier Ausflüge bei Ali gebucht und dafür einen Mengenrabatt bekommen. Ali ist freundlich, zuverlässig und spricht sogar Deutsch :-)
Alle Touren haben uns überzeugt, weil wirklich alles gegeben wird, um dir eine perfekte Urlaubserinnerung zu beschaffen: Ali und sein Team bringen immer kühle Getränke in einer Kühlbox mit, die sie unermüdlich sogar mit auf die Fähre zerren. Außerdem sind die sehr flexibel und halten gerne außerplanmäßig an, wenn dir etwas ins Auge springt. Als wir eine Tour abbrechen mussten, weil es mir nicht gut ging, haben sie super reagiert und mich sofort ins Hotel gebracht (und wollten nicht einmal den vollen Tourniers, obwohl ja schon alles gebucht war). Wir waren rundum zufrieden mit Ali und Lamin und können sie nur wärmstens empfehlen! :-)

title: Flexible, knowledgeable and friendly
text: We first booked an improvised, custom made tour to visit the mangroves. The very kind guide Salomon impressively arranged it within half an hour. All was taken care of in a very professional and friendly way. Our guide could tell us not only a lot about the environment (including birds, plants etc) but also about the Gambian society. Afterwards we booked immediately a four wheel drive tour, which was just as pleasant and informative as our first tour. Highly recommend if you want to go off road and really want to get to know the country in a pleasant way.

title: Roots tour
text: We booked with bushwhacker after meeting some people who recommended them. Everyone we met or spoke to was extremely friendly and helpful. We went on the roots tour with Lamin, who was an excellent guide. We had a great day and if we come back we'll definitely book with them again. We had a great day and can highly recommend. Thank you!

title: Great Visit (bring sunblocker and cash)
text:
The Roots Tour is pretty straightforward. You get picked up from your hotel around 8 am (I guess some people got picked up before) and you drive to the harbor. There you meet with other groups and you start your visit. About 2.5h up river, then you disembark and see two villages where you get to see a (surprisingly good albeit dated) Slavery Museum, meet the family of Alex Haley and the chieftain of the village. After that you go back on the boat, have some food (very good) and then use one of the fishing boats to check Kunta Kinte Island. Despite being a UNESCO site there are clear problems with rising water levels and the site could and should use an upgrade. Then you go back to the boat and sail down river to the harbor. Back in the van and back to your hotel around 5.30 pm. 

Good things: Lamin, the guide was great on explaining and answering whatever question you had. 
Not so good things. The boat is slow and unfortunately there is not much to see/do in the village but that is not an issue of the tour.

title: Kleinschalig, goed verzorgd
text: 3 tours geboekt (Roots tour, Gambia river en safari in Senegal. Vriendelijke kundige gidsen. Maximaal 6 personen per groep. Waar voor je geld!

ownerResponse.text: Thanks a lot for using our services and putting up this review.

title: We recommend this company
text: They describe their tours really clearly. They have lovely, well informed staff. Ali, the boss, really helped us to make plans for our onward travel to Janjanbureh.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks a lot well appreciated. I hope you have enjoyed the rest of your travel.

title: '' EEN FANTASTISCHE GIDS''
text:
Een betere gids kun je niet vinden in een  groepsexcursie of privé
 hij neemt je overal mee
Naar eigen keus en in uw tempo van wat u leuk vind maakt hij ook excursie's op maat en laat echt gambia zien waar de meesten niet komenen vergeet niet uw camera, lolly''s en luchtballonnen voor de kinderen onderweg niet.
Een halve of hele dag en zelf's een meer daagse excursie is geen probleem alles word geregeld
De hele dag zal hij goed op u passen en u goed verzorgen 
Niks moet alles mag het heeft dan ook veel bijgedragen aan onze fantastische vakantie

title: Sper vakantie Gambia.
text: Ik heb op een forum gezeten om informatie in te winnen over Gambia, wij wilde heel graag een aantal excursies maken. Ik wist alleen niet bij wie(betrouwbaar)zo ben ik aan Yaya gekomen via de forum. Wij waren super tevreden en zijn 3 hele dagen op tour geweest. Het was een fantastisch geregeld, prima op tijd. Zoals beloofd was is het ook inderdaad gegaan. Niks op aan te merken, het was een geweldige bijdragen aan onze vakantie. Yaya als wij terug komen, boeken we jou weer. Groetjes Yade, India, Natascha

title: Fantastische gids
text: Fantastische gids Yaya.zeer. vriendelijk en zeer deskundig.Hebben samen met.hem van alles bezocht .niks was te gek en zeer duidelijke uitleg  over het hoe en waarom.Van krokodillen poel tot markt en museum.We hebben mede.door hem een goede indruk van dit land en zijn vriendelijke inwoners gekregen.

title: Het echte Gambia gezien
text: Wij zijn door Yaya fantastisch begeleid en hebben alles gezien van Gambia. Wij zijn ook op plekken gekomen waar niet elke toerist kan komen. Zoals een ontmoeting met een echt typisch Gambiaans gezin in een klei huisje. Maar ook kan je zonder enige moeite met Yaya naar Senegal om daar een wandeling met leeuwen te maken en de big five te spotten. Waar andere toeristen via de grote touroperators minimaal drie dagen vooruit een visum voor Senegal moeten aanvragen en niet zeker er van zijn die te krijgen hoeft dit bij Yaya niet. Hij regelt dit direct aan de grens. Daarnaast gaat een groot deel van zijn opbrengsten naar het onderhoud van zijn compount en zet hij zich kosteloos in voor vele goede doelen uit Nederland.  Yaya is zeer betrouwbaar en heeft een hart van goud. Als u alles maar ook echt alles wil zien van get prachtige Gambia zit u bij Yaya bij het juiste adres.......

title: Eerste vakantie Gambia
text: Na een dag wennen aan een andere cultuur(geweldig,vriendelijk!) Ontzettend genoten vd gastvrije gids Yaya. Vrijheid,blijheid staat voorop. De leukste excursies die op U afgestemd word! Alle mooie,culture,(het echte leven) plekjes ziet u op eigen tempo.Heeft u naast de trips hulp nodig(wat dan ook!) Yaya helpt je waar hij kan. Niks is een probleem.In 1 woord SUPER.Twijfel niet neem Yaya als gids en u beleefd een heerlijke vakantie!Wij hebben genoten.

title: Never again
text:
What a disaster journey,!!
The lazy boat was talking us and 30 other guests, the boat was old and rusty 
The upper deck had couple of plastic chairs and 2 loungers followed by 4 dirty mats.
The boat stopped for swim on a small island after putting the ladder out on side of the boat, the treads on the steps snapped (2) the lady going down the 
Steps had large gouge out leg 
They had no first aid 
The lady was taken to local hospital and had 8 stitches 
Please check safety protocols

title: How can you summarise the trip in 120 characters I don't know. Amazing, the whole experience from the ferry onwards. Fathala res
text: From arriving at the ferry, the total experience. Sharing a ferry with people, goats ,chickens cars, a whole experience in itself. Before a forget, a big shout out to our guide Sheriff, very informative, gave us the best experience. The experience at border control, all the villages we passed with the smiling children. The safari and lion walking just wow, I think a part of my heart belongs in Africa

title: Super excursions with a super guide!
text:
We had booked 3 excursions with Aji: Fathala, Roots and south Gambia.
Aji is a little lady with a big heart and a lot of knowledge about her country.
All excursions went smoothly and in a small group, which is really nice as we don't like big group excursions.
Food and drinks were provided every time and were very yummy.
We decided to go with Aji Tours because she is the only woman who owns an excursion business in The Gambia and she supports the local women.
I think a lot more people shoukd do this, you won't be dissapointed! ;-)

title: Tummen upp för Aji Tours och Omar :)
text:
Vi bodde på ett Hotell precis brevid Aji Tours och hamnade där av en slump, vilket visade sig bli väldigt bra. Första utflykten var till krokodilparken med vår Guide Omar, han
var väldigt trevlig och kändes erfaren. Han berättade mycket intressant fakta längs vägen, utan att bli "för mycket" som vissa kan bli.

Direkt vid hemkomst så bokade vi en ny utflykt, en heldags tour för att se mer av Gambia. Då besökte vi Serrekundas marknad, djur och köttmarknaden, båttur på lamin lodge där vi fick se hur ostronfiske går till, sanyang beach, den lokala fiskemarknaden och Monkey park. 
Den lokala marknaden och fiskemarknaden var helt nya och speciella upplevelser och miljöer, men det kändes tryggt med Omar som lotsade runt oss överallt. Han kände folk var vi än kom, och ett till plus var att han var riktigt barnkär. Min blyga tvååring pratar fortfarande om honom en vecka senare fast vi nu är hemma i Sverige.

Tyvärr var vi bara en vecka i Gambia, jag hade gärna gjort fler utflykter med Aji Tours och Omar men det får bli nästa gång 😊

title: Super gehad
text: Wij hebben vorige week 2 tours met Aji gedaan. Naar Fathala en Makasutu Park. We hebben het zo leuk gehad! Aji wist veel te vertellen over het land en wist al onze vragen te beantwoorden. Ook snacks en drinken was goed geregeld. Het was vooral ook gezellig! Bij de grens naar Senegal hadden we een klein probleempje met onze vaccinaties maar Aji wist dit meteen op te lossen. Zeker een aanrader!

title: nice excursion with a very nice guide , AK
text:
We (family of 3) did the fathala trip, aji and her guide picked us up at our hotel and then of to the ferry (Banjul-Barra) .The trip on the ferry is an experience in it self, al the local people, cars and animals using the ferry for daily business, everywhere colourfull.
In Barra we go with an open jeep and our guide , AK, to the border of Gambia-Senegal, an experience again.
At Fathala Park we see zebras, "pumba"pigs, monkeys and we got very close to the giraffes. We also got lucky to see the rhino , Kevin, .(there is only one in Fathala)
On the way back to the ferry we had a nice lunch at a local place.
All the way our guide tell us al lot about the local people and the things we see 
Aji and AK thank you for the very nice day
Thanks from Daddy (Ron)

title: Bezoek Fathala (natuurreservaat in Senegal)
text:
Leuke uitstap!Met open jeep tot aan de Ferry om de Gambia rivier over te steken.Deze oversteek is een avontuur op zich.De Ferry wordt dagelijks door de gewone bevolking genomen,kippen,geiten,auto’s ,.. vanalles zie je op de bootVervolgens ga je de grens met Senegal over ,waar je met een open jeep naar het natuurreservaat rijdt.Onderweg roepen de kindjes je na en zwaaien,alsof je een beroemdheid bent.Er wordt door sommige reisorganisaties gevraagd om snoepgoed en schoolgerief(potloden,schriften)aan te kopen om uit te delen aan de kinderen.Dit gaf mij een dubbel gevoel,het schoolgerief tot daar aan toe maar het snoepgoed kan misschien beter vervangen worden door gezondere dingen zoals fruit of rijst.De mensen hebben geen geld voor deftige tandverzorging,daarom vind ik het uitdelen van snoepgoed geen goed idee alsook dat je meer mensen kan helpen met een kommetje rijst dan een lolly.De kinderen vechten onderling voor het snoepgoed,wat ook niet leuk is om te zien.
Het natuurreservaat is heel groot waar je met u open jeep doorrijdt op zoek naar de neushoorn,giraffen,zebra’s,..spannend en adembenemend om de dieren in hun natuurlijke habitat te zien.
Aji zelf is een heel enthousiaste jonge vrouw die met veel passie over haar land en alles errond vertelt.
Zelf steunt ze met de opbrengst van de organisatie de lokale bevolking,wat een heel mooi gebaar is.
Ik vond de hele activiteit een echte aanrader

title: leuke privé trip gemaakt
text:
ruim een halve dag met Aji in een taxi vele leuke plekken bezocht.
ze wist ook veel te vertellen over de gewoontes en levensomstandigheden van haar landgenoten.
in positieve zin was het te merken dat dit bedrijf door een vrouw gerund wordt.

title: Excursion Fathala
text: Super journée avec l'équipe Aji tour: Agence à recommander sans hésitation très belle expérience en Gambie

title: Banjul und Bakau
text:
Wir (zu zweit) waren mit Aji persönlich unterwegs und haben uns von ihr alles zeigen lassen, was uns interessiert hat. Sie konnte uns alles bestens erklären und ging zu 100% auf unsere Wünsche ein. Zwischenstopp (Geldautomat, Café...) waren eine Selbstverständlichkeit für sie. Wir hatten überall so viel Zeit wie wir wollten, um das Treiben an der Denton Bridge, am Royal Albert Market, am Hafen oder am Fischmarkt in Bakau genau zu beobachten. Kein Vergleich zu Bustouren mit Massen an Teilnehmern und festen Routen und Zeiten!! Außerdem hat sie uns sehr beim Feilschen geholfen, was uns viele Dalasi gespart hat.
Und wer jetzt meint, dass dieser Luxus viel zu teuer wäre: ganz im Gegenteil! Das maßgeschneiderte Programm ist sogar um einiges günstiger als die Massenware.
Außerdem ist Aji eine sympathische junge Frau, die ihre Aufgabe sehr ernst nimmt und alles tut, um ihren Kunden einen Eindruck von ihrem Land zu bieten. Großartige Erfahrung!!

title: Wonderful locally owned and woman led ethical business
text:
I visited Aji while I was in Gambia last week to enquire about her tours, after discovering her website while still in the UK and thus making contact.

Her office is opposite Boss Lady restaurant in Kotu and easy to find. Aji has a tremendous amount of knowledge and experience in Gambia as a guide and has recently set up her own business in order to offer competitive, ethical tours to visitors that showcase the best the Gambia has to offer.

My favourite thing about Aji was the fact she is empowering local women (and herself) to succeed in a male dominated industry and is working very hard to ensure every customer is satisfied at a fair price.

We went with Aji on the South Gambia tour which included:

- A visit to the batik factory and the opportunity to purchase fabrics and other handmade items such as jewellery, woodcraft and wall hangings.There in one price 'bush price' but if you feel the price is too high, you may negotiate. You will also have the opportunity to try your hand at the batik painting!

- A visit to the recycling centre where you may see cans being recycled then moulded into different household items. The pots and pans making workshop was particular enlightening. 

- A visit to paradise beach and a buffet style meal on the beach.

- A visit to the fishing village of Tanji, and the opportunity to speak with fishermen and the people buying fish to sell on the retail market. Expect to see snapper, barracuda, shrimp and observe traders cleaning squid on the beach. You may also observe the men smoking fish for sale.

- A visit to the animal market where you will see goats, cattle and sheep for sale. 

- A trip to Serrekunda market where you can purchase and barter for goods.

- A trip to local villages where you may take the families a bag of rice and vegetables to assist them in feeding themselves. As many families lives off the land, during the dry season crops are often sparse so this is a really good thing to do, to thank the working classes of gambia for allowing us to visit them. This is not for the faint hearted as it is heartbreaking to see the warm, grateful reaction to what many may think of as basic foodstuffs that we take for granted. 

- A boat trip through the mangroves and a visit to a 100 year old Baobab tree with a natural tree house formed by years by growth. 

During all of the above activities it is possible to see all manner of wildlife. Aji has good bird knowledge and can identify bird species for you if your knowledge in this area is lacking.

Many of the above activities are located in local areas that are the off the tourist track so you will need to  be prepared for dusty areas, heat, and the obligatory insects everywhere! 

Overall Aji is a fantastic guide and the money she makes goes directly into the local community. For example, women who work for her may use their wages to pay school fees for their children in the hope of providing a better future for them. I would not hesitate to reccomend Aji and I am only sorry I did not have the time to have further experiences with her. That said I fully intend to visit Gambia again this year and will book all future tours with Aji, no question. She is a real credit to the industry and the country

-

title: Amazing trip to Kunta Kinteh Island
text: Me and my family went for the boat trip to Kunta Kinteh Island with Aji tours. We had checked around with many of the different tour companies but ended up booking with Aji. It was the best choice we could have made! Aji was our guide for the day and we really got everything that she promised us. It was just the 6 of us on the boat which made it really intimate and also meant that we could do everything in our pace. When my parents had trouble to understand the guide on the island Aji directly found another one for us, she was very attentive to make sure that we got the best experience, The food was also really delicious. I really recommend Aji tours and a visit to kunta kinteh island!

title: Tendaba Camp
text:
Ich buchte bei Aji eine Tagestour in das Tendaba Camp mit Bootstour zur Vogelbeobachtung und Mitragessen. Sie ist die einzige die diesen Ausflug in einem Tagestrip anbietet. Abgeholt wurden wir nicht wie üblich mit einem Minibus sondern in einem PKW. Aji, die Chefin, ihr Bruder Abraham als Guide und Vogelexperte sowie unser Fahrer. Abraham erklärte alles über das Land, Natur, Vögel usw.
Auf der Fahrt entdeckte Aji gekochte Mangos am Straßenrand, wie hielten an und sie kaufte welche, sehr interessanter Geschmack, ähnlich einer Pellkartoffel, leicht süß. Nach 2,5 Std.erreichten wir das Camp. Abraham machte mit uns einen kleinen Spaziergang am Ufer und zeigte uns Schlammspringer, Winkerkrabben und Webervögel.
Dann ging es aufs Boot. Die Fahrt dauerte über 2 Std durch die Seitenarme des Gambia Rivers. Die Wetlands sind die Heimat vieler Vögel, zb Seeadler, Goliatreiher, Hammerkopf, Eisvogel, um nur einige zu nennen. Nach diesem schönen Erlebnis gab es Mittagessen, typisch Gambia style, sehr lecker diese Erdnusssoße. Danach ging es zufrieden zurück. Bei dieser Tour sind Softdrinks inklusive.
Aji Tours ist sehr zu empfehlen, am besten Kontakt über WhatsApp oder Anruf.

title: Prima, ervaren gids.
text: Had voor de reis al per mail contact gehad. Tijdens de reis twee excursies geboekt. Orientation Tour zeer geslaagd, Abuko minder (weinig te spotten). Hij doet dit al ruim 20 jaar, dus kent iedereen.

title: betrouwbare en ervaren gids
text: Wij hebben met Simon 4 excursies gedaan. Fathala wild park in Senegal, Makasutu park, Zuid Gambia tour en een op maat gemaakte excursie naar Abuko Nature reserve, krokodillepool en Lamin Lodge. Iedere excursie was in orde en goed georganiseerd. Simon weet heel veel van Gambia en je komt op plaatsen waar je met de grote touroperators nooit komt. Wij raden hem echt aan. Als we ooit terug naar Gambia gaan, dan doen we zeker de 2 daagse naar Georgetown met hem.

title: Gladde gozer
text: De tours die ik bij deze man geboekt had waren niet allemaal vol, tot twee x toe een aangepast programma gehad maar wel de volle pond betalen...zou zelfs nog 6 euro terug moeten krijgen...helaas...6 euro is in Gambia 3 daglonen! Bij het bezoeken van een dorp eerst  nog zeep en andere presentjes gekocht, niet alles werd uitgedeeld ....bleef toch wat aan de strijkstok hangen

title: Perfect!
text: We zijn heel blij dat we voor Simon Tours gekozen hebben. Heel veilig en goed georganiseerd! 2 trips, heel persoonlijk en alles was mogelijk, niks was te gek. Echt een gouden tip! Bedankt Simon!

title: Perfect
text: Heel persoonlijke service en perfect in orde! 2 trips geboekt en beiden een fantastische ervaring! Thx simon

title: Een top vakantie gehad.
text:
Anderhalve week vakantie geboekt naar Gambia. Natuurlijk wil ik, zoals bij al mijn vakanties, veel zien van het land. Vooraf dus veel gelezen in boeken en op internet. Zo ben ik terecht gekomen bij Simon Tours. Vooraf mailcontact gehad en mijn wensen aangegeven. En op de dag dat ik in Gambia aan kwam, was Simon persoonlijk 's avonds aanwezig in mijn hotel. Samen een programma opgesteld voor een echte Gambia Experience. Wel direct die avond al afrekenen.
De volgende dag al direct op pad. Alles top geregeld. En dat gold voor alle dagen. Gedurende 6 dagen hebben Simon en Lamin (een gids in dienst van Simon) mij geweldig rond geleid door Gambia en één dag door Senegal. Doordat je altijd met kleine groepjes gaat, gaat alles ook lekker vlot. Er was altijd drinken voor handen en de lunches waren ook prima geregeld.
Als je niet de hele dag op het strand wil liggen maar het echte Gambia wil ontdekken, raad ik je zekers Simon Tours aan. Altijd alles goed geregeld, flexibel en erg vriendelijk.
Simon en Lamin, bedankt voor the real Gambia experience.
Greetings,
Jos

title: Top gids
text:
Wij zijn met Simon 2 dagen op stap geweest, 1 trip naar Zuid Gambia en 1 trip naar Fathala.
Alles was prima geregeld, door met een lokale gids op stap te gaan zie je meer het echte Gambia.
Simon is een fijn persoon om mee op excursie te gaan en geeft veel informatie.
Volgend jaar zeker weer!
Remon en Sabine

title: Trip Zuid Gambia
text: Net terug uit Gabia Afrika. Wij hebben daar met Simon van SimonTours een afwisselende trip gemaakt in Zuid-Gambia. Het was een hele ervaring de afwisseling maakte het beeld wat we hadden van Gambia helemaal waar👍. Dus als u besluit om een trip te maken kies dan voor SimonTours in Kotu en Sennagambia. Ook met Simon trip gemaakt naar Monkey Park waar de apen pinda’s uit je hand pakken en Crcodile Park waar je op de foto komt terwijl je een krokodil aait👊. Wil je stoer op safari ga dan met Simon in een jeep naar Senegal Fathala een wildpark waar giraffe zebra’s neushoorn buffels en indrukwekkende bomen te zien zijn. De trip daarheen is al een hele belevenis vooral op de ferryboot👍. Je kunt natuurlijk deze uitjes zelf ondernemen maar ons gaf het een veilig vertrouwd gevoel om dit georganiseerd te ondernemen met Simon en zijn collega’s.  Ook heeft Simon een taxichauffeur voor ons geregeld die ons keurig bracht naar diverse restaurants s’avonds in de Strip/uitgaansdeel van Sennagambia/Kololi. Wij wensen u in Gambia een fijne verblijf en terug te komen naar Nederland met veel herinneringen en foto’s.

title: Makasutu trip
text:
I can highly recommend Simon Tours. This was my 5th Gambian holiday but the first time I had used a local tour company. This trip was £10 cheaper than Thomas Cook's and tailored to the size of our group. No tour of other hotels!
Our guide Lamin B was a genuinly nice guy.

title: Heel goed voor elkaar
text:
Je hebt ontzettend veel keuzes in Gambia om met een tourguide op pad te gaan. Wij kozen vanaf Nederland al voor Simon door de goede beoordelingen op TripAdvisor. Bij Simon reis je met kleine groepjes, als je wil kan je zelfs een privé-tour aanvragen volgens mij. Hij is erg vriendelijk en je kan je tour aanpassen naar eigen wil. Het voordeel van Simon tours ten opzichte van andere grote toeristische tours vonden wij: de kleinere groepjes en het is vaak nog goedkoper ook! 
Wij konden vooraf niet betalen omdat we geen Dalasi bij ons hadden, hij bracht ons gerust naar een bank en wachtte tot wij gepind hadden. We konden zelfs achteraf betalen. Betrouwbaar en goed dus!

title: Simon Tours is een aanrader voor wie het echte Gambia wil zien!!!
text:
Wij deden beroep op Simon Tours om deel te nemen aan een aantal trips tijdens onze reis naar Gambia (februari 2019).
Wij bezochten met hem James Island(1 dag) en ook een aantal marktjes, ambachten, dorpjes … (1 dag) + de tweedaagse trip naar Georgetown met overnachting (back to basic).
Wij kunnen Simon zeker aanraden, het is een zeer aangename een leerrijke ervaring geweest. Simon neemt u mee naar het echte Gambia, daar waar grote touroperators niet komen, en hij kan als inwoner als niemand anders uw vragen beantwoorden.
Neem het van ons aan : SIMON TOURS IS TOP !!!!!!!
Het is een zeer aangename persoon, en hij is zeer correct, betaling op voorhand is geen probleem, u mag hem vertrouwen en er zijn geen verrassingen nadien!
Tijdens de uitstappen zorgt hij de hele dag voor frisse drankjes en een lunch in typische zaken.

title: Met Simon Tours op safari naar Senegal
text: Toen we in Gambia zijn aangekomen, via e-mail contact gemaakt nadat we op de website hadden gekeken! Wij kozen voor de dagtrip Fathala park in Senegal. Snelle en duidelijke reactie op mail en netjes op tijd bij onze afspraak. Onze vrouwelijke gids vertelde ons wat wel en niet kon, gaf een goede voorbereiding op de oversteek per boot en zorgde dat het ons aan niets ontbrak. De boot is echt mega druk, na de boot ga je per jeep naar de grens om daarna richting Fathala park te gaan. Bij terugkomst onderweg een heerlijke lunch en hebben we nog bij een school gekeken! Ondanks dat we een lekke band reden, we te maken kregen met de corruptheid van de politie, bleef onze gids correct / duidelijk en vriendelijk en hadden we ook het volste vertrouwen in haar. Simon Tour is een echte aanrader en zouden we zo weer vragen voor excursie!

title: Real Gambia experiance with Simon Tours
text:
Van 16/2/19 tot 20/2/19 hebben wij 3 top excursies gedaan met Simon tours nl.Lazy day,
Fathalla park en south Gambia.Alle 3 met de Fantastische gids Lamin.Je kan met gerust hart van thuis uit deze excursies regelen.Simon (Saidou) komt langs in je hotel om verder uit te werken.Alles op een eerlijke en correcte manier .Ook de betaling gebeurt netjes(alles wel in Dalasi)Excursies kunnen aangepast worden aan uw eigen wensen.
pick up gebeurt aan uw eigen hotel.Als je Gambia wil verkennen zullen wij dat volgende keer zeer zeker met Simon tours doen en met Lamin als gids

title: Fabulous birthday tour
text:
Had a great day with our excellent guide Lamin at Makasutu for our friends birthday.
Our vintage land rover turned up on time and we were driven straight away to Makasutu, no stopping to pick up others. 
The Makasutu guides got on really well with our guide and this made for a more personal experience.
Can’t fault the day would definitely book with Simon’s tours again.

title: Fijne gids met interessante excursies
text:
We hebben via Simon Tours 3 excursies geboekt en kijken daar met veel plezier op terug. In een kleine groep (4 personen) bezochten we veel interessante dingen in Gambia en Senegal en kregen we goede uitleg. 
Simon zorgde voor drinken onderweg en koos prima lunchadressen. 
Kortom: een aanrader!

title: Met Simon Tours zit je goed .Vertrouwd en kwaliteit (With Simon Tours will be fantastic.Value for money)
text:
Op internet gezocht naar Simon Tours. Kreeg snel een programma voor de week dat wij er waren.Alvast Abuko reservaat en Twee daagse tour naar JanJangBureh gereserveerd.Bij hotel afgesproken .Vooruit betalen is altijd spannend maar... hij was er.
Boeiende tours gedaan want wij wilden ook naar Baobab Island. Dat zat nog niet in zijn programma ,dus wel gedaan voor € 60 pp. Met heerlijke lunch,boottocht en wandeling.
Kortom Simon is een prima alternatief voor TUI tours (duurder) e.a.
Overigens het Bijilo reservaat is zeker ook de moeite waard. Voor vogelaars daar een bird watcher bestellen ,uitstekend.(400 Dalasi)

title: Unfortunately a bad experience
text:
We contacted this organisation before we went to Gambia. They insisted to book/choose the tours in advance (we didn't know yet there were a lot of opportunities to book them on arrival in Gambia). After a few mails and questions, he finally confirmed our tours on monday and wednesday. Upon our arrival, he changed it into tuesday and wednesday, but we already made some other plans for that day. That's why he set us up with Timo Tours on Monday to see Fathala Reserve in Senegal. Timo Tours turned out to be a company for Finnish Tourists... (we are Belgians, so it wasn't that much fun). 
I would not recommend the Fathala tour. The road to Fathala is very long: drive to the ferry, ferry, customs of Senegal, drive to Fathala (ofcourse that's not their fault). It was nice to see, but also very chaoticly organized by the organisation. We saw some nice animals there, but in my opinion the animals are too used to tourist and aren't really 'wild' anymore, so it just seemed like a zoo without the fence to me (although it was beautiful to see them so close by).
We drived around for an hour or so, without a lot of info from the guide. Also, our tour guide from Timo Tours was sitting next to us, but was also making pics with his big tablet all the time, which blocked our view a lot (and that's not what you expect when you pay them).
Then we got lunch in the little restaurant of the Reserve. We could only choose pizza. The guide claimed that the pizzas were that big that one was enough for the two of us and insisted we shared one.
